definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Determining the antipersonnel force of arms is one of the main tasks in detecting arms.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定枪械杀伤能力是检测枪械的重要项目之一。

sentences.english: Determining the antipersonnel force of arms is one of the main tasks in detecting arms.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定枪械杀伤能力是检测枪械的重要项目之一。

sentences.english: This article introduces QPQ technology in the applications of firearms.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了QPQ技术在枪械上的应用。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the design and components of the measuring system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了枪械扭簧扭矩测量系统的设计及组成。

sentences.english: Random Submachine Gun, Shotgun, and Pistol at beginning of round.
sentences.chinese: 随机枪械组合，包含冲锋枪，散弹枪和手枪。

sentences.english: The student from Sisseton High School in South Dakota was arrested in possession of a mini arsenal of guns and bomb-making equipment.
sentences.chinese: 他因非法持有多种枪械和制造炸弹设备而被捕。

sentences.english: Police have confirmed that both men were armed with handguns.
sentences.chinese: 警方已经确认两人均持枪械。

sentences.english: According to reports, police used firearms against sleeping demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，警方使用枪械袭击熟睡中的示威人群。

sentences.english: And how do guns influence the nature of violence in America?
sentences.chinese: 枪械又是如何影响美国暴力的性质的呢？

sentences.english: Please write the details of personal firearms in a separate paper.
sentences.chinese: 如申请人已拥有个人枪械，请另页填写详情。

sentences.english: The early time uses in the flintlock bullet which the firearms launch many for the iron grain or the lead shot.
sentences.chinese: 早期用于枪械发射的火枪枪弹多为铁粒或铅丸。

sentences.english: Then again, wake up excited love of guns, then smoothly pull come.
sentences.chinese: 于是再次激醒对枪械的热爱，那就顺手牵来了。

sentences.english: Between that and the zip gun, San Quentin was starting to look like an episode of the A-Team.
sentences.chinese: 这些自制枪械让圣昆汀看起来像一集《A字特工队》。
